Title: Relates to adult vaccination reporting requirements
Summary: Requires a health care provider who administers an immunization to a person nineteen years of age or older to report such information to the department of health or to a regional health information organization unless such person objects to such reporting.
LawCode: Amd ยง2168, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to adult immunization reporting requirements
